content: If you have a rectangular garden that measures 12 meters by 15 meters, what is the area of the garden in square meters?

The area of a rectangle is calculated by multiplying its length by its width. In this case, the garden measures 12 meters by 15 meters. So, the area would be:

Area = Length × Width
Area = 12 m × 15 m
Area = 180 m²

Therefore, the area of the garden is 180 square meters.
